Posts.Content: May 13, 2009 11:50PM barbara2 wrote:  Hi, Nichole,  There is a website for people with Her2+ breast cancer.  It is wonderful.  It contains a message board, similar to the conversation posted (above) here, clinical trials, and an assortment of other topics that pertain to Her2+ cancer.  I encourage you to go to the site as you will find a wealth of information there, and the most generous individuals imaginable (such as those that post on this site) that give of their time and knowledge to help others who are in need of information and support.  The site is located at: www.her2support.com Barbara
Posts.Title: For my Mom aka Superwoman Nicole_Bronx Nicole_Bronx
